hanzi-su-wiki:
戻

Значения

Возвращаться; повернуть назад, возвращать; тошнить

Мнемоника

Вернуться из-за нападения собаки 犬 из подворотни 戸.

Варианты

戾
purpleculture_pinyin:
lì
Japanese variant of 戾
Японский вариант 戾
rtega_mnemonic:
戾戾RS
戻戻		perverse, reach, return
  • dog 犬 at the door 戶 coming back
  • simpl. 戾 → 戻
heisig_constituent: re-, door, one, ceiling, flag, large, St. Bernard
heisig_story: The key word signals a "coming back" or return to some place or activity. Its elements: door . . . St. Bernard dog.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: re-, return, revert, resume, restore, go backwards
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: повторно, возврат, Revert, резюме, восстановить, идти в обратном направлении
koohiiStory1: The St. Bernard dog whining at the door of his master’s house in order to re-enter / re-turn inside.
koohiiStory2: Think about hachiko, the dog waiting at the door of the station, waiting for his master to re-turn.
jp_example_words:
取り戻す(とりもどす): to take back, to regain
払い戻す(はらいもどす): repay, pay back
戻す(もどす): restore, put back, return
戻る(もどる): return
jp_readingExamples: 戻す (もど.す), 戻る (もど.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This door is big and you need to return it to its rightful owner. This door is too big and important looking to not belong to someone. You need to find its owner and return it to them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Heft this big door in your arms. It’s very heavy. Feel your arms tire as you look for who to return the door to.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You are in return mode (もど). When you enter this mode, you concentrate only on returning something. Nothing else matters in this mode. You’re in full on return mode.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You’re obsessed with returning this big door. Once you enter this mode, the only way to get out is to return the thing you have.
Ru_Meaning: re-, return, revert, resume, restore, go backwards
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 大 (большой), 尸 (труп), 戸 (дверь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the big (大) door (戸) is the return door

戻字的基本解释

戻
tì
车壁两旁的门。

戻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tì］
［《廣韻》他計切，去霽，透。］
(1)古代辎车车壁两旁可推开的门。
(2)指辎车。
(3)同“替”。

戻字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【户字部】　戻； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页415第07
【集韻】【韻會】?他蓋切，音太。【說文】輺車旁推戶也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?他計切，音替。又【集韻】大計切，音弟。義?同。　【說文】从戶，大聲。與下从犬者有別。

戻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
戻字的起名意思

暂无。

tì
Doors on both sides of the car wall.
戻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tì］
["Guangyun" he planned to cut, go to Ji, and thoroughly. ]
(1) The doors that can be opened on both sides of the wall of ancient carts.
(2) Refers to the vehicle.
(3) Same as "for".

Name meaning
Nothing.
lì
яп. вм. 戾
Radicals: 戸, 大  (door, big)
Meaning Mnemonic
This door is big and you need to return it to its rightful owner. This door is too big and important looking to not belong to someone. You need to find its owner and return it to them.
Heft this big door in your arms. It’s very heavy. Feel your arms tire as you look for who to return the door to.
Reading Mnemonic
You are in return mode (もど). When you enter this mode, you concentrate only on returning something. Nothing else matters in this mode. You’re in full on return mode.
You’re obsessed with returning this big door. Once you enter this mode, the only way to get out is to return the thing you have.
